Financial: Military retirement pay exclusion from state income tax
Emergency financial assistance through Louisiana Department of Veterans Affairs
Small business loans and grants for veterans
Education: Louisiana Veterans Education Grant - tuition exemption for children of disabled veterans
In-state tuition for veterans and military families
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
Reduced-fee licenses for other disabled veterans
Housing: Disabled Veterans Property Tax Exemption - up to ,000 assessed value
Property tax exemption for surviving spouses
Louisiana Housing Finance Agency veteran programs
Adaptive housing grants for disabled veterans
